title: WANTED T206 Eddie Collins w/ American Beauty or Cycle back
author: Archive

posts.post_title: WANTED T206 Eddie Collins w/ American Beauty or Cycle back
posts.post_content:
Posted By: B O'Brien
Hello all,
I am looking for a T206 American Beauty, Cycle or SC Fact 25 Eddie Colllins.  I passed on the AB a couple months ago from a board member, and have been thinking about it ever since.  Let me know if anyone has one to sell.
I am also looking for a Cycle Collins in VG or VGEX.  Hopefully the owner that I have begged in the past will loosen up and sell!!!
I would also consider a SC 350 Factory 25 Collins.
Thanks,
Bob
upperhandisforemost@yahoo.com

Also, still looking for some HOFers or a Chase black cap with these backs (VG-VGEX).  Key targets are Black Chase, Collins, Baker, Joss and possibly a white cap Matty.

16. American Beauty - Series 460 - Factory 42 - District 4 - State NC

22. American Beauty (without frame) - Series 350- Factory 25 - District 2 - State VA

23. Cycle - Series 350 - Factory 25 - District 2 - State VA

25. Sweet Caporal - Series 350-460 - Factory 25 - District 2 - State VA

34. Sweet Caporal - Series 350 - Factory 25 - District 2 - State VA
